summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2017 FORD F-150. THE CONTACT INQUIRED ABOUT A RECALL FOR BRAKE FAILURE. WHILE DRIVING 40 MPH, THE CONTACT DEPRESSED THE BRAKE PEDAL AND IT EXTENDED TO THE FLOORBOARD. AS A RESULT, THE CONTACT REAR ENDED ANOTHER VEHICLE. THE AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED AND THERE WERE NO INJURIES. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER OR INDEPENDENT MECHANIC. THE ENTIRE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE WAS DAMAGED AND THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DRIVEABLE. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED BACK TO THE CONTACT'S RESIDENCE. THE CONTACT FILED A COMPLAINT WITH FORD MOTORS AND WAS ADVISED TO CALL NHTSA. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 54,000.
